item.title: Counter-intuitive
item.description: Came across a gem in first few pages of Vishy Anand’s Mindmaster, which resonated strongly with me.

item.title: Plunge
item.description: As they say - dont idolize your heroes. Its always disappointing when you see them up close. Such is the case with doyens of technology.

item.title: ORA-04091
item.description:
Sounds familiar? A friend encountered it recently.

Mutating table problem from within a row level trigger on running a SELECT on the same table.
